title: IVR-Based General Geography Knowledge Deepening Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic geographical concepts and spatial cognition skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining HMD (Head-Mounted Display) and desktop, applying geographical knowledge to strengthen decision-making competencies for organizational managers/leaders

learning_goals: Three or more topographical features and their correlations with human activities can be explained by analyzing geographic data presented in an IVR environment.
After comparatively evaluating HMD and desktop learning, learners can select suitable learning methods for individual/team projects with over 80% accuracy.
Strategies for applying geography knowledge acquired through formative assessments to real business scenarios (e.g., new market entry plans) can be presented using a PBL approach.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
